examples: He kicked the ball into the goal.
The kids played catch with a ball in the park.
Él pateó la pelota hacia el gol.
Los niños jugaron a atrapar con una pelota en el parque.

suggested: Why did the ball quit school? It couldn't bounce!
The ball had been kicked around so much that it had lost its shape.
The ball was punctured by a sharp rock and it ruined the game.
Did you know that some balls can bounce higher than a three-story building?
The sound of a basketball hitting the rim and bouncing away.
The feeling of catching a football in the end zone.
The connection and camaraderie that can come from playing a game with a ball.
